name: Social Menace
description:
A short demo of a serious game called Social Menace, developed in Unity as part of a college class called Games Engines for Interactive Applications.

The theme addressed by the game is online toxicity, encouraging the player to think about their own behaviour when faced with toxic people, posts and comments online and in social media.

All art and sounds have been sourced,  some from Kenney.nl, but most from GameDev Market.

This  project is now on hold,  the class only required a demo to be made. This may be revisited at a future date to   develop into a full game.
